price: 24. (sakydami): „Ten tikrai neįžengs šiandien pas jus (joks) vargšas.“
arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
